text: Tivadar Filótás was a modern pentathlete from Hungary. Tivadar competed at the 1928 Summer Olympics. He was born on October 18, 1903 and died on August 2, 1945.Tivadar Filótás == References == Category:1903 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Hungarian modern pentathletes
title: Tivadar Filótás
